data.name: The Kingdom of Squares
data.description:
# No.1 of the number series

Story:

There is a family in the Universe of Maths, and there are SO MANY kids that their parents can't even count how many.

One day, the smallest kid in this family got fed up with her brother, and wandered off. But there was just one small problem.

She doesn't know the way!

So she wandered along the way when she found herself in a strange place.
All people here are squares!
A police officer came to her and spoke to her gently: Hey kid, I see you're lonely. How about joining our kingdom?
She thought about it for a while, and made her decision: DEFINITELY! The police officer lead her to a police station, and made her sit on a weird chair.


wherrrrrrr...... Test initializing:
Calculating Square root - Failure.
Calculating Half's Square root - Success.
Calculating Double's Square root - Success.
Finalizing Test --

The police officer said: Wow! You're really one of a kind! Your pattern is the royal pattern, kid! You're now the Lord of 144!

Question:

So here comes the question:
WHO IS THIS KID, AND WHO ELSE IS IN HER FAMILY???
